entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
